scripts.build:style: node-sass --output-style expanded --precision 6 source/scss/style.scss assets/css/style.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 assets/css/style.css.tmp -o assets/css/style.css
scripts.build:leaflet: node-sass --output-style expanded --precision 6 source/scss/leaflet.scss assets/css/leaflet.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 assets/css/leaflet.css.tmp -o assets/css/leaflet.css
scripts.build: npm run build:style && npm run build:leaflet && npm run build:js && npm run clean
